    org.apache.mailet.MailetConfig

    public class MailetConfigImpl
extends Object
implements org.apache.mailet.MailetConfig
    Implements the configuration object for a Mailet.

      • getInitParameter

        public String getInitParameter(String name)
        Get the value of an parameter stored in this MailetConfig. Multi-valued parameters are returned as a comma-delineated string.
        Specified by:
        getInitParameter in interface org.apache.mailet.MailetConfig
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the parameter whose value is to be retrieved.
        Returns:
        the parameter value

        Returns:

        public String getInitAttribute(String name)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
